7200.name: The Treasury
7200.description: You are in a small but well equipped treasury.  You can see some writing on the wall.  The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see.  You can get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.

east.description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.

7201.name: The Inner Lair
7201.description: You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls.  The floor is  made from black stone.  In the western wall you see a large black stone door.

south.description: You look back through the door into the lair.

west.description: You see the treasury.

7202.name: The Lair
7202.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.  To the north is a wooden door.

north.description: You can see the inner lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

7203.name: The Lair
7203.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

7204.name: The Lair
7204.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

east.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see the lair entrance.

7205.name: The Lair
7205.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7206.name: The Lair
7206.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

south.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7207.name: The Lair
7207.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls.  You also see a lot of slime.  On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

north.description: You see another part of the lair.

west.description: You see another part of the lair.

7208.name: The Lair Entrance
7208.description: You are in a dry part of the sewer.  To the north is a wooden door, you can see some slime at the lower part of the door.  You also see some skulls and some broken bones.

north.description: You can see the lair.

east.description: You see a crawlway.

7209.name: The Crawlway
7209.description: You are in a narrow crawlway.  It is rather boring here.

east.description: You see a four-way junction.

west.description: You see the entrance to a lair.

7210.name: The Four-Way Junction
7210.description: You are in a sewer junction.  To the north is a small hole, to the west is a narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.

north.description: You can see a small cave-like room.

east.description: You can see a sewer drain.

south.description: You can see a sewer drain.

west.description: You can see a narrow crawlway.

7211.name: The Small Cave
7211.description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.

south.description: You look back into the four-way junction.

7212.name: The Sewer Drain
7212.description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.

north.description: You can see the drain continuing north.

west.description: You can see the four-way junction.

7213.name: The Sewer Drain
7213.description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the east.

east.description: You can see the drain continuing east.

south.description: You can see the drain continuing south.

7214.name: The End Of The Drain
7214.description: You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the only exit is west.

west.description: You see the sewer drain.

7215.name: The Half-Wet Drain
7215.description: You are in a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water.  To the north it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into some water.

north.description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.

south.description: To the south you see a sewer drain filled with water.

7216.name: Under Water In The Sewer
7216.description: You are swimming in some dirty water and are holding your breath.  You'd better continue onwards before you drown.  It is a good thing that you can hold your light above the water-level.

north.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.

south.description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.

7217.name: The Half-Dry Drain
7217.description: You are in a half-dry sewer drain.  To the north the drain runs a little bit downwards into some water to the east you can see a small hole.  To the west you see another drain.

north.description: You see the drain running down into some water.

east.description: Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

west.description: You see a drain running to the west.

7218.name: The Very Small Room
7218.description: You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.

west.description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.

7219.name: A Dry Sewer Drain
7219.description: You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain.  The drain continues east and south.

east.description: You see a half-dry drain.

south.description: You see another boring sewer drain.

7220.name: A Boring Drain
7220.description: You are in yet another sewer drain.

north.description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.

east.description: You can see another drain to the east.

7221.name: The Sewer Drain
7221.description: You are in a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a  loud echo.

east.description: You can see another sewer drain.

west.description: You can make out a sewer drain to the west.

up.description: You can see a sewer line.

7222.name: The Sewer Drain
7222.description: You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.

east.description: You see a sewer bend.

west.description: You see a sewer drain.

7223.name: The Sewer Bend
7223.description: You find yourself in an ordinary sewer bend, which bends from west to north.

north.description: You see a sewer drain.

west.description: You see a sewer drain.

7224.name: The Sewer Junction
7224.description: You stand in a junction of three sewer drains.  You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as if from a gigantic rat.  North and south the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little strange.

north.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

south.description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.

west.description: You see a strange sewer pipe.

7225.name: The Sewer
7225.description: You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole. You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.  There  is a sewer drain south.

south.description: You see a sewer drain.

7229.name: The Strange Sewer
7229.description: You are in a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat.  And you can see a lot of organic decay like bones from animals AND humans.  West the drain runs slightly upwards.

east.description: You see a sewer junction.

west.description: You see a slimy sewer drain.

7230.name: The Damp Sewer
7230.description: You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the  substance you see a lot of decay.  You see some odd scratches on the wall, as if from a gigantic rat.  Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run down.

east.description: You see a sewer.

west.description: You see a sewer.

7231.name: The Strange Sewer
7231.description: You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer wall, and a lot of debris on the floor.

east.description: You see a sewer.

west.description: You see another sewer.

7232.name: The Sewer
7232.description: You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls.  And of course a whole lot of decay.  The drain runs east and north.

north.description: You see yet another sewer line.

east.description: You see a sewer pipe.

7233.name: The Sewer Drain
7233.description: You stand in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like room.  You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as if from a gigantic rat.  The sewer leads south.

east.description: You see a cave-like room.

south.description: You see a sewer.

7234.name: The Rat's Lair
7234.description: You are in a little cave.  You are able to see quite a lot of debris on the floor.  There is a sewer drain west of here.

west.description: You see the sewer system that way.

7279.name: The Wall Of The Abyss
7279.description: You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness.  There is an exit leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to do so.

7280.name: The Entrance
7280.description: You are in a very dark room.  You notice that some faces are staring at you from inside the walls.  In the middle of the room there is a small altar. To the north there is a small round door.

north.description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

7281.name: The Corridor
7281.description: The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue.  You can hear wailing through an open black hole to the east.  To the south there is a round door.

east.description: The hole seems more black than the night.  It is appears to be "eating" the red light around it.

7282.name: The Realm Of Lost Souls
7282.description: You are standing in nothing.  All around you there are stars. Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly.  To the north there is a small bright hole.  To the west there is a small red hole.

north.description: You look into a very bright hole.

west.description: You look into a red hole.

7283.name: The T-Crossing
7283.description: You are in a small hallway.  There are doors to the east and to the west.  To the south there are a black hole.  There is writing in the wall.  Wails can be heard from the south.

east.description: It is too dark to tell.

south.description: A black hole in the wall.

west.description: You can see a big fire to the west.  It looks like a unhealthy place to enter!

7284.name: The Firedeath
7284.description: This room is very hot.  There are flames surrounding you.  You can see no exits at all!  Skeletons are lying all over the floor.

7285.name: The Torture Room
7285.description: You are standing in a middle of a square room.  Along the walls skeletons  are hanging in rusty chains.  In the middle of the room there is a big metal  box, covered with dust.  To the south you can just make out a small exit.

south.description: It is too dark to tell.

7286.name: The Hell Yard
7286.description: You are standing in a lot of mud.  A disgusting smell surrounds the place, and makes you feel sick.  Small flames sometimes shoot up from the hot mud.  To the west there is a small door.  To the  north you can see an iron door.

north.description: It is too dark to tell.

west.description: It is too dark to tell.

7299.name: On The Walls Of The Abyss
7299.description: You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the ground down below.  You cannot see anymore handholds below you and thus this stops your journey down, as the only exit is up.

7300.name: Cave Entrance
7300.description: You are standing in the cave entrance.  It is very dark down here.  There is writing on the wall.  There is an exit to the north.  A stairway leads up.

north.description: To the north you can see a small tunnel.

up.description: You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

7301.name: Cave Tunnel
7301.description: You are walking in a tunnel.  It is very cold.  You can feel the presence of a living thing... SOMEWHERE.

north.description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.

south.description: To the south tunnel continuing.

7302.name: Cave Room
7302.description: You are standing in a room.  It is much cooler now.  The walls are glowing.

east.description: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.

south.description: To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

7303.name: The Cave T-Cross
7303.description: You are standing in a mudlike substance.  The smell here is awful, it is rotten.  To the west you can see some light.

east.description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.

west.description: You can see some light to the west.

7304.name: The Cave Turning-Point
7304.description: The mud is getting deeper.  You are wondering, 'Would it be an idea to leave, before I disappear?'.  To the south you notice a flat round stone is blocking the way.  To the west you can see mud.

south.description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

7305.name: The Secret Room
7305.description: There is dust all over the place.  It looks like nobody has been here for ages.  In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe. The globe glows with a pulsing light.  To the north you see a stone door. To the south you see a grey block.

north.description: You see a round stone door.

south.description: You see a grey block.

7306.name: The Mudhole
7306.description: You are standing in a lot of mud.  The mud goes to your chest.  You feel the presence of something IN the mud.  The only obvious exit is to the west.

north.description: You can see nothing at all.

7307.name: A Tunnel
7307.description: The mud goes to your knees.  Otherwise the tunnel looks very normal.

east.description: You can see a mudhole.

7308.name: The Long Tunnel
7308.description: Here there is almost no mud, as you stand at the top of a small rock.  Just beside you there are a sign which says 'WARNING!  The worms are dangerous!'

north.description: You can see a lot of mud... Yuck!

south.description: The tunnel goes a little downwards.

7309.name: The Hot Room
7309.description: You are very surprised, as this room for a change are hot instead of cold.  To the north it goes downwards into some mud.  There are also an exit to the west.

north.description: You see a lot of mud.

west.description: You see a entrance to a small room.

7310.name: The Small Room
7310.description: As you look around you notice a small statue.  There are exits to the west and to the east.

east.description: It is pitch dark out there.

west.description: You see a VERY long hallway.

7311.name: The Stalagmite Cave
7311.description: You are standing in a stalagmite cave.  Water is dripping from the walls. It is very cold in here.

east.description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

7312.name: The Stalagmite Tunnel
7312.description: You has entered a small tunnel.  Here it is quite dry.  Maybe it would be a good idea to rest here.

north.description: You can see a small cave to the north.

7313.name: The Spongy Room
7313.description: You definitely do NOT like this area.  It is very dank, and most of the room is wet.

7314.name: The Stalagmite T-Cross
7314.description: You are standing in a cross.  To the north you can see some light. Otherwise it is dark.

north.description: You see some light ahead.

7315.name: The Blind End Room
7315.description: This room is obviously a blind end.  To the north you see a primitive picture.

north.description: You see a primitive picture of some people dancing around a huge sun.  The sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

7316.name: The Treasure Room
7316.description: This room is richly ornamented.  The walls have been carved to show people dancing around a moon which is drawn on the floor.  It looks very old, and it is very dusty.  To the south you see the back side of a secret door.

south.description: You can see a picture with some peeple crawling around a huge moon.

7317.name: The Square Lair
7317.description: You are standing in the south-east part of the lair.  You can see a skeleton lying in the corner.

north.description: Another part of the lair.

west.description: Another part of the lair.

7318.name: The Square Lair
7318.description: You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see a sign on the wall.

east.description: You see a wooden door.

south.description: Another part of the lair.

west.description: Another part of the lair.

7319.name: The Square Lair
7319.description: You are standing in the north-west part of the lair.  Here there is another sign.  There is an exit from the lair to the north.

north.description: You see a small tunnel leading north.

east.description: Another part of the lair.

south.description: Another part of the lair.

7321.name: The East Tunnel
7321.description: You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east and west.  To the west you see a wooden door.

west.description: You can see a wooden door.

east.description: You can see a muddy tunnel.

7322.name: The North Tunnel
7322.description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

north.description: The dark tunnel continues.

south.description: You can see the lair.

west.description: You can see a cave entrance.

7323.name: The L-Shaped Room
7323.description: You are standing in deep darkness.  To the south there is a small exit. To the east you can see a gaping hole.

7324.name: The Circular Hall
7324.description: You are standing in round hall.  To the north, east and south you can see a stone head hanging on the walls.

north.description: You see a red dragon's head hanging on the wall.

east.description: You see a green dragon's head hanging on the wall.

south.description: You see a blue dragon's head hanging on the wall.

west.description: You see a room far away.

7325.name: A Dusty Tunnel
7325.description: You are standing in dust.  This place has not been touched for a long time.  Otherwise it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest!  To the west you see the outline of a door.  A tunnel leads to the east.

east.description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards.  It is quite dark.

west.description: You can see the outline of a door.  Just like in the description!

7326.name: The Crossing
7326.description: You are standing in a crossing of hallways.  You can leave this place in every direction, except up and down.  In the dust you notice strange footprints.

7328.name: The Dragon's Lair
7328.description: You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red.  All kinds of bones are scattered all over the floor.  On the walls you can see some burned shapes.  You smell burnt flesh.  Two creatures are half melted into the floor.

north.description: You can see a long tunnel.

west.description: You can see nothing but darkness.

7330.name: The Windy Tunnel
7330.description: You are standing in a tunnel.  Above you, you can feel a breeze.

east.description: It is too dark to tell.

7331.name: The Glittering Room
7331.description: This room is very bright.  On the walls you can see some silver.  Exits are west, east and south.

7332.name: The Secret Passageway
7332.description: You have entered a tiny room.  There is only an exit to the west.

west.description: You can see a light to the west.

7333.name: The End Of Long Tunnel
7333.description: You are at a end of a long tunnel.  Right in front of you, you can see a grey mass.  To the east you can see a tremendously long tunnel, but you know that, you were just there.

east.description: A long tunnel.  JUST like in the description!

west.description: A grey mass is blocking the way.

7334.name: The Stair-Room
7334.description: You are standing in a small room.  Drawings of faces in pain are on the walls.  You can feel that darkness is ruling the place.  There is one exit: south.

south.description: Nothing but darkness...

7335.name: A Dark Tunnel
7335.description: You are standing in a dark tunnel.  It continues to the north and to the south.  Bones are spread on the floor.

7336.name: The Entrance To The Lair
7336.description: The smell here is awful.  To the south you can see some smoke.  A tunnel leads north and east.

south.description: The only thing you can see is smoke.

east.description: A small cave is to the east.

7337.name: The North-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7337.description: It is hard to see here because of the smoke.  To the north you can barely see a small tunnel.  Other exits are to the south and to the west.

7338.name: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7338.description: There is a very small hole in wall from which the smoke is coming from.  Otherwise it is pitch black.  Exits are north and west.

north.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

west.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

7339.name: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7339.description: You can see some hay spread on the floor.  The smell is awful here, and it makes you feel sick.  This place where the Basilisk sleeps.  Watch out... maybe it is not far from here...

7340.name: The South-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
7340.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

7341.name: The Small Cave
7341.description: You are standing in small cave.  You can see some light at the end.  Exits are north and south.

north.description: You can see only smoke.

south.description: You can see a blue glow.  And you feel a fresh breeze... ahhhh...

7342.name: The Northern End Of The Pool
7342.description: You have wet feet, you are standing in water.  The water looks calm.  You can see that it is a big lake.  Light seeps from the water.

north.description: You can see a small cave.

east.description: You can see more water.

south.description: You can see water.

7343.name: The Pool
7343.description: You are swimming in water.  It is getting deep here.  It is also dark in this end.

south.description: You can see some bubbles in the water.

west.description: You see calm water.

7344.name: The South End Of The Pool
7344.description: You standing in water up to your neck!  You can only see water.

north.description: You can see calm water.

east.description: To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

7345.name: The Pool
7345.description: You are swimming in DARKNESS.  You feel something touching your right leg.

north.description: To dark to tell.

east.description: You can feel a warm breeze.

7200.name: mindflayer
7200.long_desc: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
7200.description:
It is a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now.  In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

7201.name: mindflayer
7201.long_desc: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
7201.description:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high.  Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand.  In the center of its head are four
large tentacles with very sharp points.

7202.name: mindflayer
7202.long_desc: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
7202.description:
This mindflayer is six feet high.  It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth.  It has four small tentacles in the center
of its head.

7203.name: wererat
7203.long_desc: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
7203.description:
The wererat is about four feet tall.  It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.

7204.name: rat
7204.long_desc: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
7204.description:
The gigantic rat is about ten feet long from head to tail and has claws the
size of your head, looking very nasty.

7200.name: rod
7200.room_desc: The mysterious devil rod lies on the floor.

7202.name: mace
7202.room_desc: a small mace has been left here.

7203.name: cloak
7203.room_desc: A purple cloak lies on the floor.

7204.name: potion
7204.room_desc: A neon blue potion stands on the floor.

7205.name: key
7205.room_desc: A black key has been left on the floor.

7206.name: skull
7206.room_desc: A strange white skull lies on the floor looking at you.

7207.name: gauntlets
7207.room_desc: A pair of muddy gauntlets have been thrown away here.

7209.name: boots
7209.room_desc: A pair of muddy boots has been dropped here.

7210.name: treasure
7210.room_desc: There is a huge treasure here, looking very valuable.

7211.name: sword
7211.room_desc: A short sword is lying here.
